name: New JetBlue Mint Studio Review
description:
JetBlue recently announced they’d transform US Business Class with a complete redesign of the Mint Cabin on their A321LR to prepare for beginning their service to London in Summer 2021.

In advance of JetBlueMint service to London, the airline began serving the JFK - LAX route with the new Mint service and I was lucky enough to get onboard!

In this JetBlue Mint Studio Review, you’ll be able to judge for yourself what you think of the JetBlue Mint Studio on this A321LR. 

In this JetBlue Mint Studio Review, you’ll see how JetBlue redesigned the cabin to create the largest business class seat on a US Carrier, which they call the Mint Studio. You’ll also check out JetBlue’s innovative Mint food. You’ll even see the largest built-in inflight entertainment screen in the US…it’s a whopping 22 inches!

You’ll also see how much JetBlue’s Mint Studio costs.

Is this First Class on a low cost carrier? You be the judge after this JetBlue Mint Studio Review!

0:00 Introduction
3:07 JetBlue Mint Studio Tour
5:26 How to Book JetBlue Mint Studio
6:17 JetBlue Inflight Entertainment
8:13 JetBlue Mint Food
10:45 JetBlue Mint Studio JebScore
13:07 Landing
